rect.style: fill: #ffffff; fill-opacity: 1; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000
fill: #ffffff; fill-opacity: 1; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000
fill: #ffffff; fill-opacity: 1; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000
fill: #ffffff; fill-opacity: 1; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000
fill: #ffffff; fill-opacity: 1; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 1; stroke-dasharray: 4; stroke: #000000

path.style: fill: #d8e5e5; fill-opacity: 1; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 10; stroke: #000000

line.style: fill: none; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: 10; stroke: #000000
